and.name: jOrganizer
and.description: jOrganizer app organizes your daily needs! Simple command line based tool basically for organizing meetings. Some main features are print/import/export the schedule of an user.

and.name: Calendar
and.description: Basic feature of the jOrganizer. Consists of typical calendar functions like visualisation of date and time.

and.name: Meetings
and.description: Enables the function to create, change and delete meetings/appointments. A meeting consists of a unique title, date, time and duration, a place and remark.

and.name: Print
and.description: Print function for meetings. Possible output formats would be pdf, html, markdown or plain text documents.

or.name: Import-Export
or.description: Basic I/O operations for import from and export to different (calendar) formats.

or.name: Share
or.description: Share function (like modern social media "share buttons") with a possibility for several share protocols.

or.name: Reminder
or.description: This feature is basically the alarm function adapted to meetings.

and.name: Notes
and.description: Function for quick notes (like one note) or a todo-list. Will be displayed next to the pending meetings.

feature.name: History
feature.description: History function for storing and displaying old notes.

and.name: Clock
and.description: Simple digital clock function, shows the current date and time.

and.name: Alarm
and.description: Alarm feature. Depends on clock function. Opens a graphical PopUp with a user defined message.

feature.name: Sound
feature.description: Play a sound in a graphical PopUp.
